short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience luxury and speed with Porsche Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension showcases the iconic Porsche sports car in stunning detail, bringing the thrill of the open road to your new tab. Quickly access your favorite websites, add custom links, and stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy the sleek and powerful design of a Porsche sports car.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly visit your go-to websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with your most-used links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on track with an integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Easily search the web with your preferred engine.
Explore more car-themed extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
